org.apache.river.reggie.proxy

Class RegistrarProxy

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.river.reggie.proxy.RegistrarProxy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Administrable, net.jini.core.lookup.ServiceRegistrar, net.jini.export.ProxyAccessor, net.jini.id.ReferentUuid, SafeServiceRegistrar

    public class RegistrarProxy
extends Object
implements net.jini.core.lookup.ServiceRegistrar, SafeServiceRegistrar, net.jini.export.ProxyAccessor, Administrable, net.jini.id.ReferentUuid, Serializable
    A RegistrarProxy is a proxy for a registrar. Clients only see instances via the ServiceRegistrar, Administrable and ReferentUuid interfaces.
    Author:
    Sun Microsystems, Inc.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • Fields inherited from interface net.jini.core.lookup.ServiceRegistrar
